description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate & Cherry Christmas Puddings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Christmas pudding,Cherry,High fibre,High protein,Roast,Low salt,Christmas,Chocolate,Chocolate pudding,Summer
name: Chocolate & Cherry Christmas Puddings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place cherries and port into a saucepan and bring to the boil over medium heat. Simmer for 5 minutes until cherries have softened. Remove from heat and cool.
Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Grease 6 x 1-cup capacity mini pudding bowls and line bases with baking paper. Lay a tea towel into the base of a roasting pan and sit bowls on top.
Stir chocolate and butter in a heatproof bowl over a saucepan of simmering water until melted and smooth. Cool.

Beat eggs and sugar in a bowl with electric beaters until light and creamy. Sift flour and cocoa over egg mixture and stir in with almond meal. Add chocolate and cherry mixtures and stir gently until combined.
Divide mixture evenly between bowls and smooth tops. Pour enough hot water into roasting pan to come halfway up the sides of the bowls.
Bake for 35 minutes or until puddings are cooked through when tested in the centre with a skewer.
Meanwhile, to make chocolate sauce, heat cream in a small pan over medium heat until small bubbles form around the edge. Remove from heat, add chocolate and stir until melted and smooth.
Stand puddings for 5 minutes. Turn out onto serving plates. Serve with chocolate sauce spooned over and topped with a fresh cherry.
